page.title: 09Tourism in S.E. Guildford
page.content:
{Tourism.}There are many hotels and public houses in Guildford. These cater for tourists who visit the area to see the castle and the museum. An example is the Clavadel Hotel. Business is especially good in the summer when plenty of foreigners are around. The locals also use the hotel bar.
{The Supernatural.}At the Percy Arms in Chilworth, a poltergeist called George pushed people out of bed and knocked at doors. Originally the inn was used as a mortuary for the gunpowder works. It is probable that George was a victim. There is also a ghost at Postford House. A murdered body was hidden behind the panelling of the drawing room in the eighteenth century. Footsteps have been heard at night.
